content: tcm390: Merged 2 PRs, including #4670 "fix: shortcut reply only if no dynamic provider is present" (+2658/-1145 lines) and #4651 "fix: reply action skipping dynamic providers" (+1/-40 lines), while modifying 58 files with a total of +2659/-1185 lines across 4 commits. Maintained a consistent work pattern, focusing primarily on other work (75%) and bugfix efforts (25%).
